name: What Remains of Edith Finch
description: The regular version sold in GOG.

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/What Remains of Edith Finch/Dead Space.exe

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select gog Windows setup exe
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/What Remains of Edith Finch/Dead Space.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /silent
    executable: $CACHE/dxsetup/DXSETUP.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /NOCANCEL
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
